T02D1702:57b-4: dpal sgrol ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1702:57b-5: sgrol ma ljang ser cho ga yis //
T02D1702:57b-6: 'chi bdag chad pa zhi mdzad cing //
T02D1702:57b-7: mkha' 'gro srin po'i gnod pa rnams //
T02D1702:57b-8: sgrol bas sgrol ma mchog yin no //
T02D1702:57b-9: re zhig rmi ltas dang lus kyi rnam 'gyur la sogs pa 'chi ba'i rtags rnams rmis shing /
T02D1702:57b-10: dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa rnams
T02D1702:57b-11: kyi 'jigs pa chen po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D1702:57b-12: snying po'i grangs bgrangs shing ma yengs pa'i bsam gtan
T02D1702:57b-13: mang du goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas dben pa'i sa
T02D1702:57b-14: phyogs su stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D1702:57b-15: lus kyi 'jug pa sngon du btang /
T02D1702:57b-16: byams pa dang snying rje chen po sems can la
T02D1702:57b-17: bskyed pa sgyu ma lta bu'i blo cung zhig goms
T02D1702:57b-18: par byas te / skad cig gis dpal sgrol ma
T02D1702:57b-19: chen mo sku mdog ljang ser rin po che sna
T02D1702:58a-2: phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar chos smra ba'i phyag rgyas autpala sngon po 'dzin pa /
T02D1702:58a-3: padma dang zla ba'i steng du skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1702:58a-4: de'i thugs kar padma dang zla ba'i steng du t'am
T02D1702:58a-5: ljang ser de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas
T02D1702:58a-6: dus ma yin par tshe'i dus byed pa'i sems can
T02D1702:58a-7: rnams kyi 'chi bdag gi mthu med par byas la
T02D1702:58a-8: / tshur la bsdus la sgyu ma lta bu'i blos
T02D1702:58a-9: sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams la dmigs
T02D1702:58a-10: shing snying po'i mchog 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D1702:58a-11: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re bha ya
T02D1702:58a-12: ha ra ni h'um h'um h'um mri ty'u danda ya
T02D1702:58a-13: ma danta ya m'a dhu na sv'a h'a /
T02D1702:58a-15: gzungs dang sbyin sreg dang gtor ma dang mchod pa phul la bstod pa bya'o //
T02D1702:58a-16: de'i rjes la gro ga la gur gum gsum gyis
T02D1702:58a-17: 'khor lo rtsibs bdun pa bris la che ge mo'i
T02D1702:58a-18: sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig la sogs pa spel
T02D1702:58a-19: la snying po dang gzungs dgod par bya'o //
T02D1702:58a-20: de nas rin po che'am rdza sar pa kha sbyar ram /
T02D1702:58a-21: rva 'am shing gi za ma tog gi nang du
T02D1702:58a-22: 'khor lo dril la skud pa dmar pos snod lan
T02D1702:58a-23: mang du bcing / dar ram ras dkar po'i na
T02D1702:58a-24: bzas g-yogs la dge 'dun gyi sde chen po'i gtsug
T02D1702:58a-26: mchod rten gyi shing la bcings la /
T02D1702:58a-27: dus khyad par can la mchod pa chen pos mchod
T02D1702:58a-28: cing bsgom pa dang snying po dang gzungs dang bstod
T02D1702:58a-30: 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs mo che //
T02D1702:58a-31: khyed kyi gsang sngags rjes dran pas //
T02D1702:58a-32: 'chi bdag gnod pa zhi gyur nas//
T02D1702:58a-33: zhabs kyi rdul la reg par shog /'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1702:58a-34: panti ta chen po ta th'a ga ta rakshi tas mdzad pa 'chi ba bslu ba rdzogs so /
